title: Duties of attorney general, director of finance
context: §29-12 Duties of attorney general, director of finance. The attorney general and the director of finance shall promptly initiate the necessary action to take advantage of or secure any federal aid which may be available to the State or its political subdivisions. [L 1951, c 289, §2; RL 1955, §12-2; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §14; am L 1963, c 114, §1; HRS §29-12]
